1.0.name: wordpress/shopp-contactology
1.0.description:
This plugin integrates Shopp with Contactology.

Currently, there is an option to "opt-in" to email marketing during the checkout. However, this option only provides the store owner with permission to send emails to the customer.

It does not add the customer to any third-party email services.

With Shopp + Contactology this issue is resolved. If a customer "opts-in" to email marketing during checkout, then their email, first name, and last name are sent to a specified list on Contactology.

Recommendations

  • Need help with your Shopp ecommerce store? Hire a Shopp consultant today.
  • View additional WordPress plugins for Shopp by Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC
  • Follow Lorenzo on
